popularDestinations.name: Rio de Janeiro
popularDestinations.description: Is a coastal city in Brazil, famous for its Copacabana beaches, the 38 m high statue of Christ the Redeemer on Corcovado Hill and Sugarloaf Mountain, a granite peak with cable cars ascending to its summit.

popularDestinations.name: Cusco
popularDestinations.description: Cuzco is a city in the Peruvian Andes that was the capital of the Inca Empire and is known for its archaeological remains and Spanish colonial architecture.

popularDestinations.name: Sevilla
popularDestinations.description: The Plaza de España is an architectural complex located in the María Luisa Park in the city of Seville. It was designed by the architect Aníbal González. It was built between 1914 and 1929 and is the largest construction of the Ibero-American Exposition of 1929.​​​​

specialOffers.offerDescription: For this hot month, we offer a 30% discount on flights to Cusco, exclusively for tourism trips.
At the end of the year we are offering a 20% discount on flight tickets for promotional student trips.
Por tu primer viaje organizado por nosotros accederas al descuento exclusivo del 50% de descuento en algun vuelo de primera clase.
